title: Repair takes  forever
body: This is why I dont fucking play this game. It wont even let me play. First of, Repair takes forever(More than a day) then when it patches it goes to 90% then goes down to fucking 65%. When it's finally over I join a game, after champion select it crashes then everything repeats itself... WHY!!!

replies.body:
That is an absurdly long time, it should not be like that at all!  Unless you have an older hard drive that's having problems writing updates, your connection could be having problems grabbing updates from patching servers or staying in sync during champion select.  See if the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide helps, and test it in a custom game.

Should the issue persist, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll work with you directly to see what the deal is.
